com.risk.map.util

Class GameUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.map.util.GameUtil

  • public class GameUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to provide game utility Initialize number of players disable enable hide show control clear Checkboxes close screen enable disable View Pane and InfoBox to display message
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    rahul
